The quote from Dr: Fauci included in the campaign ad is genuine.
However: the quote was presented out of context. Dr. Fauci was referring to the hard work of various members of the COVID-19 task force, not specifically praising President Trump.
The comment made by Dr: Fauci was from March 2020, when there had only been 300 deaths related to COVID-19 in the United States. By the time the ad aired in October, there had been over 210,000 deaths.
The video clip of Dr: Fauci was taken from an interview in March 2020, where he praised the members of the task force for their efforts, but did not specifically mention President Trump.
